metadata.Title: CVE-2023-39562 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: GPAC v2.3-DEV-rev449-g5948e4f70-master was discovered to contain a heap-use-after-free via the gf_bs_align function at bitstream.c. This vulnerability allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) via supplying a crafted file.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
